team.name: safety
team.description: Our Safety team is responsible for creating and ensuring our [community standards]( http://storygamesla.com/standards/ )

team.name: organizers
team.description: The Story Games LA Organizers team handles the general guidance of the group over all. The team oversees the organization of events and the general direction of the group as a whole.

team.name: discord
team.description: Our Discord team is responsible for the maintenance and moderation of the Story Games LA Discord channel ( https://discord.com/invite/qbPzyRYBQv ). They do not manage the Story Games LA RPG Maker's Meetup Discord. That is managed by the RPGMM team.

team.name: founders
team.description: These are the founders of Story Games LA.

team.name: RPGMM
team.description: This is the Story Games LA RPG Maker's Meetup team. They manage the online meetup and Discord ( https://discord.com/invite/NmM5cG65fE ) for the group.
